s1.title: Resources related to testing
s1.p:
Link :
Test infect your Enterprise JavaBeans, Javaworld May 2000
Article that explains the interest of in-container testing.

Link :
Endo-Testing : Unit Testing with Mock Objects, XP2000
Article from the authors of the Mock Object project on SourceForge that explains well the concept of Mock Object testing as opposed to "stubbing" and it's benefits. Also explains that Mock Object testing helps write better code. See a comparison between Mock Object vs In-Container testing here.

Link : HttpUnit project on SourceForge.
A Java library for the automatic stimulation and testing of web applications.
